meanings.definition: A three-dimensional image created by superimposing two pictures, one red and one blue, that are slightly offset.
meanings.sent1: The anaglyph on the screen seemed to pop out at me.
meanings.sent2: I put on my anaglyph glasses to see the movie in 3D.
meanings.sent3: When I wore the anaglyph glasses, everything looked like a colorful rainbow.
meanings.sent4: The anaglyph image was like a magical portal into another world.
meanings.sent5: The anaglyph picture was so realistic, it felt like I could reach out and touch it.

meanings.definition: A pair of glasses with lenses of different colors used to view anaglyph images.
meanings.sent1: I always carry my anaglyph in my bag to watch 3D movies.
meanings.sent2: The anaglyph helped me see the hidden 3D effects in the picture.
meanings.sent3: My friend thought my anaglyph glasses were a fashion statement.
meanings.sent4: With the anaglyph on, the world looked like a colorful dream.
meanings.sent5: The anaglyph glasses made the movie come to life right before my eyes.
